name: Luna Station
description:
The Station you are on, wakes you from cryo-sleep in the middle of a global warming climate storm. Can you uncover the mysteries of Luna Station before it consumes you?

Luna Station's core functions are offline, someone or something has started a global warming climate storm within the station. The stations global temperature keeps rising, why?

Play through multiple gameplay loops as you uncover the mysteries of Luna Station, solve the stations problems, find out how and why one of your lead scientists is missing.
